intro: Hiptage luodianensis, commonly known as the Luodian hiptage, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Malvaceae, which includes cotton and hibiscus. The plant is characterized by its showy, pentagonal flowers that are typically pink or purple in color. It thrives in moist, well-drained soils and is often found in forested areas. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and ecologically significant species.
